statements: SELECT * FROM property_owner_profiles;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM property_owner_profiles;
SELECT id, contact_number, policy_number FROM property_owner_profiles;
SELECT * FROM property_owner_profiles WHERE owner_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM property_owner_profiles ORDER BY policy_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_owner_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM property_owner_profiles WHERE contact_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM property_owner_profiles WHERE policy_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT id, property_address FROM property_owner_profiles WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe' AND email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties FROM property_owner_profiles WHERE property_address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM property_owners WHERE owner_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id=1001;
SELECT owner_id, contact_info FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_id DESC;
SELECT owner_name, policy_info FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003);
SELECT * FROM property_updates ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM property_updates ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT update_description, update_date FROM property_updates WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT owner_name, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM property_owners JOIN property_updates ON property_owners.owner_id = property_updates.owner_id GROUP BY owner_name HAVING total_updates > 2;
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_id, full_name, policy_info FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 'd461b2d6-f3b2-4500-8c33-1f8b0b6a1e1e';
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_value FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT * FROM profile_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_id, full_name, contact_info FROM property_owners ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE full_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_value > 100000 AND property_type='House';
SELECT property_address, property_value FROM properties ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT full_name, contact_info FROM property_owners LEFT JOIN properties ON property_owners.owner_id = properties.owner_id;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) AS num_updates FROM profile_updates GROUP BY owner_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM policy_information ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT owner_id, contact_name, contact_number FROM contact_information WHERE owner_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_information WHERE policy_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, address FROM property_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM policy_information ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_number, email_address FROM property_owners WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.owner_id, p.policy_start_date, c.contact_name FROM policy_information p JOIN contact_information c ON p.owner_id = c.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM property_owners WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT property_name, property_type, address FROM properties ORDER BY property_type DESC;
SELECT owner_name, email, address FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM policy_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT owner_name, email FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT property_name, address FROM properties WHERE property_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT policy_name, policy_start_date, coverage FROM policies WHERE policy_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, contact_number, email, address FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 2;
